comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: @iSazonov it's been discussed but too many users do not know which installer corresponds to their platform (despite extensive documentation), so this is easier than answering the same question a dozen times.

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Anyone who creates a new release creates a release notes where this information is already present.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body: Like I said, it's already extensively documented. Unfortunately that does not help users who do not read documentation (nor release notes). There exist enough users (judging by the number of questions I've fielded about exactly this) to warrant this info running up front, immediately available in the readme/front page.
